snippet.title: Pharmakon : Gameplay Trailer (EN / 2017 / Official )
snippet.description:
Steam : http://store.steampowered.com/app/654660/Pharmakon/
Pharmakon is a game about tactical battles between puzzle-powered drones and elementary beasts.
